alert.note: Alert for Golden Valley; Northern Stillwater (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 10:02PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Stillwater and southeastern Golden Valley Counties through 1030 PM MDT... At 1000 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 21 miles south of Ryegate, or 23 miles north of Columbus, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Torrential rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Heavy rainfall will cause reduced visibility and ponding of water on roadways. Locations impacted include... Halfbreed Lake Wildlife, Hailstone Wildlife Refuge, Rapelje and Molt. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
